content:
kensaku-kawamoto commented on PR #91

Could we get some examples for this?

Hey @Kendra Pugh , you drew up an example last night when we talked through this, would you be willing to formalize that a bit.

I agree with @Kensaku Kawamoto , that we could head off a lot of misunderstandings (including the one he outlines) through an illustrative example.

Isaac
